```js title=main.js
"use strict";
(self["webpackChunkwebpack"] = self["webpackChunkwebpack"] || []).push([["main"], {
"./index.js": (function (module, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__) {
__webpack_require__.a(module, async function (__webpack_handle_async_dependencies__, __webpack_async_result__) { try {
__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);
/* ESM import */var http_localhost_8999_allowed_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__ = __webpack_require__("http://localhost:8999/allowed-module.js");
/* ESM import */var http_localhost_8999_regex_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__ = __webpack_require__("http://localhost:8999/regex-module.js");
/* module decorator */ module = __webpack_require__.hmd(module);
var __webpack_async_dependencies__ = __webpack_handle_async_dependencies__([http_localhost_8999_allowed_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__, http_localhost_8999_regex_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__]);
([http_localhost_8999_allowed_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__, http_localhost_8999_regex_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__] = __webpack_async_dependencies__.then ? (await __webpack_async_dependencies__)() : __webpack_async_dependencies__);// Test file for allowed URIs functionality
// The imports are structured to test different allowedUris scenarios

// Import modules using different URL patterns to test the allowedUris functionality
// These will only work if they match the allowedUris patterns in webpack.config.js



// Importing restricted module should fail - we test this in a try/catch below
let restrictedModuleResult = null;
try {
  // This should be blocked as it's not in allowedUris
  restrictedModuleResult = __webpack_require__("http://localhost:8999/restricted-module.js");
  console.log("⚠️ Unexpectedly imported restricted module");
} catch (error) {
  console.log("✅ Correctly blocked restricted module:", error.message);
}

// Simple Jest tests to verify allowedUris functionality
it("should load a module from an allowed URI using string pattern", () => {
  expect(http_localhost_8999_allowed_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__["default"]).toBe("This module is from an allowed URI");
});

it("should load a module from an allowed URI using regex pattern", () => {
  expect(http_localhost_8999_regex_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"]).toBe("This module is from a regex-matched URI");
});

it("should block a module from a non-allowed URI", () => {
  // This module should not be loaded as it doesn't match any allowed URI pattern
  expect(restrictedModuleResult).toBe(null);
});

// Export results for verification in other tests if needed
module.exports = {
  allowedModuleLoaded: typeof http_localhost_8999_allowed_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__["default"] === "string",
  regexModuleLoaded: typeof http_localhost_8999_regex_module_js__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__["default"] === "string",
  restrictedModuleLoaded: restrictedModuleResult !== null
};

__webpack_async_result__();
} catch(e) { __webpack_async_result__(e); } });

}),
"http://localhost:8999/allowed-module.js": (function (module) {
module.exports = import("http://localhost:8999/allowed-module.js");

}),
"http://localhost:8999/regex-module.js": (function (module) {
module.exports = import("http://localhost:8999/regex-module.js");

}),
"http://localhost:8999/restricted-module.js": (function (module) {
module.exports = import("http://localhost:8999/restricted-module.js");

}),

},function(__webpack_require__) {
var __webpack_exec__ = function(moduleId) { return __webpack_require__(__webpack_require__.s = moduleId) }
var __webpack_exports__ = (__webpack_exec__("./index.js"));

}
]);
```
